name: UIViewInvalidating

items.desc: A change that invalidates a view’s configuration.

items.name: static var constraints: UIView.Invalidations.Constraints
items.desc: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.

items.name: static var display: UIView.Invalidations.Display
items.desc: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.

items.name: static var intrinsicContentSize: UIView.Invalidations.IntrinsicContentSize
items.desc: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.

items.name: static var layout: UIView.Invalidations.Layout
items.desc: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.
